import React from 'react'; import Header from './Header'; import Footer from './Footer'; export default function Privacy(){ return( <>

Privacy Policy

1. Introduction Integrity Protection and Consulting Corp is committed to safeguarding the personal information entrusted to us by our clients and website visitors. This Privacy Policy outlines the practices we adhere to in accordance with Alberta’s Personal Information Protection Act (PIPA). 2. Information We Collect We may collect and process: - Personal contact details such as name, email, phone number, and company affiliation. - Feedback, inquiries, or other forms of engagement with our services. - Technical data like IP address, browser type, and website usage details. 3. Purpose of Collection Your personal information may be used to: - Deliver and enhance our consulting services. - Address inquiries or feedback. - Conduct marketing and promotional activities, with your explicit consent. - Ensure our website’s security and optimal performance. 4. Consent Before collecting personal information, we will inform you of the purpose and obtain your explicit consent, except where otherwise permitted by law. 5. Protecting Personal Information We employ administrative, technical, and physical safeguards in an effort to protect against unauthorized access, use, modification, and disclosure of personal information in our custody and control. 6. Disclosure of Information We will not disclose your personal information without your consent unless required by law. 7. Access to Personal Information You have the right to access your personal information, subject to limited exceptions as defined by PIPA. If you believe any information we hold about you is incorrect or incomplete, please contact us as soon as possible. 8. Cookies Our website may use cookies to enhance user experience. While cookies can be declined through browser settings, some website features may not function as intended without them. 9. Policy Updates We may revise this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in legal or regulatory obligations or changes in the manner in which we deal with personal information. We will post any revised version of this Policy on our website. 10. Contact and Redress If you have questions about accessing your personal information or our privacy practices, wish to make a complaint, or require any other information, please contact our Privacy Officer at info@ipcc.ltd

) }
